record.dc:title: 45Lu92 Koger's Island, Lauderdale County, Alabama. Burial #s 23 & 25.
record.dc:creator: B.C. Refshauge
record.wpa:narrative: Burial #23 with associated grave goods. Field specimens shown here in addition to those enumerated on photo #45Lu92 (uar00228) are the following: F.S. #73 (marine conch shell) at the head of skull; F.S. #72 (chert knife) under greenstone celt on right humerus; F.S. #111 (mass of hematite) directly right of the right foot; F.S. #83 (7 bird sterna) near left foot; F.S. #s 84-93 (seven bone awls ranging from 2" to 6.5") near left foot. Burial #25 is shown in lower right foreground with F.S. #116 (shell-tempered pottery vessel) to the left of skull.
